Title: Roy joins Viessmann Clean & Cold Solutions
Summary: GERMANY: Laurence Roy has left Kelvion to lead the European coldroom sales activities of Viessmann Clean & Cold Solutions.

Title: Carrier involved in road emissions capture project

Title: Vaillant redesigns AroTherm Plus heat pump
Summary: GERMANY: A redesigned AroTherm Plus air-to-water heat pump is set to be launched by Vaillant in Germany and Austria this month.
